ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Which Exp. Pack to buy.
ygData.msgSnippet: Well I didnt take the Bazaar into account. I was merely thinking about travel.  However, with the Bazaar SoL would be a better purchase cause then it s easier
ygData.messageBody:
Well I didnt take the Bazaar into account. I was merely thinking about travel.  However, with the Bazaar SoL would be a better purchase cause then it's easier to buy armor and gear for your level.
 
Wulfric
 
 
 
 
----- Original Message -----
From: naslund19@...
To: EverQuest@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Tuesday, January 21, 2003 9:46 AM
Subject: Re: [EverQuest] Which Exp. Pack to buy.

> From: "Wulfric Rennison" <wulftech@...>
>
> however if you go with Luclin you may find you
> need to donate money to wizzies or druids to get
> you to a location that has a wizzy spire that can
> take you to Luclin or elsewhere...   there is
> one right in Gfay though.  I'd still say go with
> Planes of Power becasue that takes you to every
> major city which is where you'd go to buy your spells.
> The Luclin spires won't do that.

Given your level, I would definitely go for Luclin over PoP or SoV.  While the
PoP portal system makes travel much easier, at your level, SoL offers much more
to your character than either of the other 2.  The SoL port system is slower,
but you get a number of new zones to hunt in and the Bazaar, which is very
useful to lower level chars looking for decently priced gear.

Sulamwen
Warder of <Fate's Forge>
E'ci
